effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If it's currently nighttime or the wild Pokémon was encountered while walking in a cave, this ball has a catch rate of 3.5×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3.5× at night and in caves.

flavor_text_entries.text:
夜や　どうくつなど　暗いところで
ポケモンが　捕まえやすくなる
ちょっと　変わった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like caves.

Poké Ball un po’ diversa che rende più facile
catturare Pokémon selvatici di notte o in luoghi
bui come le grotte.

Es algo particular. Hace que sea más fácil
capturar a los Pokémon salvajes por la noche
o en lugares oscuros.

Ein mysteriöser Ball, geeignet für Einsätze in der
Nacht oder an dunklen Orten.

Une Poké Ball efficace de nuit ou dans les
endroits sombres, tels que les grottes.

밤이나 동굴 등 어두운 곳에서
포켓몬을 잡기 쉬운
조금 특이한 볼.

よるや　どうくつなど　くらいところで
ポケモンが　つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like caves.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like caves.

Une Poké Ball efficace pour attraper
les Pokémon de nuit ou dans des
endroits sombres tels que les grottes.

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like caves.

makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon
at night or in dark places like caves.
